<S%H1980>"Go<s%> at <S%H935>once<s%> to <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to him, 'Have you not, my <S%H113>lord,<s%> O <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H7650>sworn<s%> to your <S%H519>maidservant,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3588>"Surely<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> your <S%H1121>son<s%> shall be <S%H4427>king<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> me, and he shall <S%H3427>sit<s%> on my <S%H3678>throne<s%> <S%H4069>"?Why<s%> then has <S%H138>Adonijah<s%> <S%H4427>become<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%>?'
